import React from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; class Forgot extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={Email:''} console.log(this.props); } handleSubmit=(e)=>{ Axios.post("http://localhost:8080/forgot",this.state).then((response)=>{console.log(response.data) if(resp) this.props.history.push('/reset',response.date[0]._id); }) } handleChange=(e)=>{ this.setState({Email:e.target.value}) } render(){ return(
